summary: Create a web solution and portfolio website with a specified background color and a good-looking UI/UX.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract geometric hero background illustration in a modern tech style (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

- Three project thumbnail illustrations with consistent style and simple shapes (project-thumb-2.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page portfolio website for a web solutions provider with a polished UI/UX and clear section-based navigation.
Implement a site-wide background color matching the user-provided background color, applied consistently across all sections and components.
Apply a coherent visual theme (colors beyond the background, typography, spacing, component styling) with a distinct modern style, used consistently across the site.
Add a Projects/Case Studies section with reusable project cards that display: project title, short description, tech stack tags, and optional external links (e.g., live demo / repository).
Add a Contact section with a client-side validated contact form (name, email, message) that provides clear success/error UI without relying on external email services.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (page title, description, favicon, Open Graph defaults) using English user-facing text.
Generate and include minimal custom static imagery for the portfolio (hero/brand visuals) and render them from frontend static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a web solution and portfolio website with the requested background color and polished UI/UX
